text: South African singer/songwriter Amanda Black has released 2 studio albums, 11 singles (including 6 as a featured artist) and 7 music videos (including 3 as a featured artist). Amanda Black's music has been released through record labels Ambitiouz Entertainment, Sony Music & her own label AfroRockstar Productions. Black achieved recognition in 2016 following the release of her hit single "Amazulu", which was nominated for several music awards. Her debut studio album Amazulu was certified platinum three weeks after its official release. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected information !
